name: Conjoined Minds
description:
After participating in an experiment conducted by Doctor Aiden Wundt, two brothers developed the ability to become a single mind. Of course not everyone would be happy with this advancements, help Jack and Zack get out of the dungeon where they have been locked up.

This is a small puzzle game where you will need to guide the two brothers through mazes and dangers using the same inputs for both of them. Try to keep them safe and get to the next level.
